title: Finally, some good looking 2D boys - Aphelios is SO HOT
body:
It only took riot 10 years, but they finally made a hyper attractive male champion. They've been arguing for years how Braum is attractive to some people, or how there's a lot of types of guys who are attractive to a small majorities of girls.

But they finally did it and made the most attractive champion to the most amount of girls. Like sure Talon, Vlad, and Ezreal were okay if you squinted, but I can finally buy skins for an actual husbando.

Like yes obviously people exist who like Darius or Garen, but the large majority of women like pristine looking pretty faced frumpy boys like Aphelios.

I'm going to buy every skin for this character on launch with every border he comes with, sorry not sorry.
